code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a 42 year old male presents with 2 days history of mild headaches particularly at the back of the head and in the morning, mild ringing in the ears, mild occasional lightheadedness and Heart. he smokes 1 pack/day for 5 years he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 68 in, Weight 117 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 145, DiastolicBP 93, Respiration 17, Heart = 2/6 systolic murmur at base of heart, Chest = clear to auscultation B/L, no rales or wheezing, Extremities = no edema or clubbing, Heart = normal S1, S2, RRR a:Hypertension p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed nifedipine - 10 mg 3 x day, and ordered Basic Metabolic Panel, Lipid panel.

Value.Value: ordered Basic Metabolic Panel , Lipid panel

content2.Value: ordered Basic Metabolic Panel , Lipid panel

td.content: s:patient with C/O mild headaches particularly at the back of the head and in the morning for 6 weeks that is frequent. pt also reports mild occasional lightheadedness, mild ringing in the ears. pt is a 43 YO white m monk. o:Height 69 in, Weight 120 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 151, DiastolicBP 95, Respiration 17, Heart = 2/6 systolic murmur at base of heart, Chest = clear to auscultation B/L, no rales or wheezing, Extremities = no edema or clubbing, Heart = normal S1, S2, RRR a:Hypertension p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed nifedipine - 10 mg 3 x day, and ordered Basic Metabolic Panel, Lipid panel.

Value.Value: ordered Basic Metabolic Panel , Lipid panel

content2.Value: ordered Basic Metabolic Panel , Lipid panel
